casebody.data:
Kipp Mendez WIGGINS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018 Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Kipp Mendez Wiggins' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn. App. 901 , 191 A.3d 1108 (2018), is denied.
